result.title: Some suggestions for status filtering
result.content:
I've noticed that status filter lacks some useful (at least for me) features:

  • Filter by group of verdicts with some predefined groups (e.g. "Does not count an attempt" (eg. CE, WA1), "Wrong attempt")
  • Predefined filter "â‰¥ first system test"
  • Only friends' solutions

Does anyone else think it would be nice to have these features?
